      • flowBegin

        public FlowBeginProcessor flowBegin(String identifier)
        Returns a new FlowBeginProcessor after assigning the identifier. The returned processor is registered at the ReplayStrategyRegistry.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier to set on the FlowBeginProcessor.
        Returns:
        a new FlowBeginProcessor.
